ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Bindings...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard stories that if you still had the .opt file for your keys, it would still work.  I believe someone on the rangers mailing list
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard 'stories' that if you still had the .opt file for your keys,
it would still work. I believe someone on the rangers mailing list
(eqrangers@egroups.com) had posted them at one point. There's been a
lot of turnaround in membership but you may want to post there to see if
anyone still has one.

Jason Harrell wrote:
>
> that was 'fixed' a long time ago (like last March).
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sinchi Yahuar [mailto:SinchiYahuar@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 8:39 AM
> To: EQCheats@egroups.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Bindings...
>
> I heard somewhere you were able to bind a skill (say forage or sense
> heading) with one of your movement keys. Is this possible and if so
> how is it done?
> Thanks
> Sinchi
